overview: Everyone has a sexual history that happened in a bar. We selected 5 women to re-experience and replay their real life experiences for us. Cassandra Nix tells us about the young salesman she fucked in the bar where she worked after work and filled her pussy with dripping cream cakes. Maddy O`reilly boasts about the time she kept spreading her legs and showing them to the bartender until she got her drink after she found out that her husband had cheated on her. The comforting bartender helps her through the separation with a stiff cock to support her. Ana Foxxx once snuck behind the bar and blew a bartender while he continued to serve drinks. Before moving to L.A., Juelz Ventura worked in a small town bar and still likes to tell the story of the customer who stayed until the end so she could get out.
title: The Bartender
